title: The Flash - Trailer, Poster, Images & Synopsis From 2.04 'The Fury Of Firestorm'
text: The Flash - Trailer, Poster, Images & Synopsis From 2.04 'The Fury Of Firestorm' Reported by Outsiders - 2015.10.22 The CW has released a new poster featuring Firestorm and a new promotional trailer for the October 27th episode, 'The Fury Of Firestorm.' We also have new images in the gallery and the official synopsis below: Barry (Grant Gustin) and the team look for another Firestorm match for Dr. Stein (Victor Garber). When the team meets Jefferson Jax Jackson (guest star Franz Drameh), Caitlin (Danielle Panabaker) has her reservations about whether Jax is the right match for Dr. Stein. Iris (Candice Patton) surprises Joe (Jesse L. Martin) while Barry and Patty (guest star Shantel VanSanten) grow closer.
